holidays.title: Day of La Rioja
holidays.description: Day of La Rioja marks the anniversary of when the autonomous community’s statute was approved.

holidays.title: Day of Murcia
holidays.description: You better get ready to celebrate the Day of Murcia, it is going to be fun.

holidays.title: Donald Duck Day
holidays.description: Well, what do you give to a duck that has it all? His own holiday!

holidays.title: Filipino-Chinese Friendship Day
holidays.description: Raise a toast to celebrate Filipino-Chinese Friendship Day right here at National Today.

holidays.title: National Cancer Thriver Day
holidays.description: Observe National Cancer Thriver Day to celebrate those surviving cancer and those thriving after beating it!

holidays.title: National Heroes Day Uganda
holidays.description: Honor the brave who gave their lives for their country on National Heroes Day Uganda.

holidays.title: National Kids Day
holidays.description: Celebrate National Kids Day by celebrating the precious kids in your life.

holidays.title: National Krewe of Tucks Day
holidays.description: National Krewe of Tucks Day celebrates having a good time and putting on a great show!

holidays.title: National Meal Prep Day
holidays.description: Organize your kitchen and treat yourself to your favorite recipes on National Meal Prep Day.

holidays.title: National No Apologies Period Day
holidays.description: Refuse to abide by the culture that shames menstruators by observing National No Apologies Period Day.

holidays.title: National Sex Day
holidays.description: Today we celebrate and tell you all about the birds and the bees.

holidays.title: National Strawberry Rhubarb Pie Day
holidays.description: It’s time to please that sweet tooth as we celebrate this delicious dessert.

holidays.title: Race Unity Day
holidays.description: Bahá'í is the original sponsor of Race Unity Day but it can be celebrated by anyone.

holidays.title: Johnny Depp’s Birthday
holidays.description: Johnny Deep has experienced many hardships but this talented actor continues to endure and thrive.

holidays.title: Les Paul’s Birthday
holidays.description: This multi-talented guitarist gave the world a musical gift that is timeless.

holidays.title: Michael J. Fox’s Birthday
holidays.description: Fox is a man who lets no health condition stand in his way of achieving greatness.

holidays.title: Natalie Portman’s Birthday
holidays.description: Portman is a talented, award-winning, astounding performer who aims to achieve greatness at its fullest.
